title: Kind of Application Error During the Period of URF?
body: I finished a game under URF mode like half an hour ago and I skipped the stats of the game because they just did not show up (At this time I was not in any queue for a new game). However, the system said that I was already assigned to a new game when I clicked the Play button to try to queue for a new URF game. Also, the PVP just indicated that I left an existing game when I quit and restart the PVP for several times. I just want to know what goes wrong with my account or if there is some error occuring to the server.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This should've resolved itself by now, these are known as ghost games and are caused by your client not receiving the proper "End Game" message upon completion of a game.

These usually resolve within a few hours.
I have no idea what is happening to my account...{{summoner:7}}
